peril.model.board

Class ModelBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • peril.model.board.ModelBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer, Board

    public final class ModelBoard
extends java.util.Observable
implements Board, java.util.Observer
    Encapsulates the behaviour of the the game board. The board consists of many ModelContinents.
    Since:
    2018-02-13
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Board, Observable, Observer

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void endRound()
      Iterates through each ModelContinent in the ModelBoard and ModelContinent.endRound().
      void forEachCountry(java.util.function.Consumer<ModelCountry> task)
      Performs a Consumer function on each ModelCountry on the ModelBoard.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ModelContinent> getContinents()
      Retrieves the ModelContinents on this ModelBoard.
      java.util.Set<? extends Country> getCountries()
      Retrieves the Set of all the Countrys that are on this Board.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Retrieves the name of this ModelBoard.
      int getNumberOfCountries()
      Retrieves the number of ModelCountrys on this ModelBoard.
      void reset()
      Clear all the ModelContinents thus deleting all the ModelCountrys and reseting the ModelBoard to its initial state.
